name: theming-log
description: Creates a logger with theme for text decoration.
author: Gulp Team <team@gulpjs.com> (https://gulpjs.com/)

scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run web-build
scripts.web-build: browserify index.js --standalone themingLog -o web/theming-log.js && cd web && uglifyjs theming-log.js --compress --mangle -o theming-log.min.js --source-map url=theming-log.min.js.map
